title: Revenue of the BSH Group 2003 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion euros is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, roughly increasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, and finally gradually increasing from 2012 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in billion euros, about 13.1 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Revenue in billion euros, of value 8.31 was reported at Year 2006
min_summary: Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year.
